Package mnkgame

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MNKPlayer
    Interface for a (M,N,K)-game software player.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MNKBoard
    Board for an (M,N,K)-game.
    MNKCell
    Describes the state of a cell in the MNKBoard.
    MNKGame
    Initializes, updates and starts the (M,N,K)-game.
    QuasiRandomPlayer
    Software player only a bit smarter than random.
    RandomPlayer
    Totally random software player.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MNKCellState
    MNKBoard cell states
    MNKGameState
    MNKGame states
